name: Unfinished Cube Game
description:
Press A to move left and D to move right.

This game is in active development, and we are adding new features whenever we can. We are just starting out on Unity, Programming, and Video Game Development, so please don't be too harsh on our game.

It can currently be played in browser, on Windows and on Android via Google Play.

Current features include:

  • Levels!
  • Endless mode!
  • Colours!
  • Probably lag

Be sure to leave your feedback on the game
